name: The Peace Maker ALC - Professional Ping Pong Paddle - Carbon Fiber Table Tennis Racket Producing Maximum Spin & Control for All Levels - Hard Carry Case & Ergonomic Handle.
short_description: 🏓 INTRODUCING THE PEACEMAKER - ALC: Our most Advanced Competition Ping Pong Paddle, designed for players looking for better responsiveness, power and control when striking the ball. Combining performance with comfort the PEACEMAKER is suited for all levels, beginners, intermediates and advanced. Used for indoor and outdoor play, level up your game with complete control.

🏓 PROFESSIONAL QUALITY & FEEL - The PEACEMAKER - ALC is a high-quality competition paddle bringing the best out of your game. The 7 Ply Blades are made up of 1 x blade of Paulownia inner wood core - 2 x blades of Ayous wood - 2 x blades of Blue/Black ALC carbon - 2 x blades of Limba wood outer blades to complete the paddle giving the racket the soft feel for great control and ultimate topspin.

🏓 PATENTED ERGONOMIC HANDLE FOR BETTER GRIP - Our unique ergonomically designed slope handle table tennis racket features a custom designed curved handle that fits perfectly to the shape of your hand. Lightweight, comfort and control is exactly what you need to improve your block, return and serve, as well as blast forehand drives and smashes.

🏓 PROTECTIVE HARD CARRY CASE - Your ping pong rackets comes with our beautifully designed custom made deluxe carrying case. It's water-resistant ensuring your ping pong paddle remains in the best condition and quality. Designed to protect the high elasticity sponge (2.1mm) that gives you the ultimate spin, keeping your paddle in the highest condition.

🏓 LIFETIME WARRANTY & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We are so confident that you will love our quality and custom design AirBlades Table Tennis Racket and hard case, that we offer a lifetime warranty on the workmanship of every paddle.

ADVANCED TABLE TENNIS RACKET TECHNOLOGY – Crystal and WRB Technologies combine to create a hardened, lightweight blade that increases ping pong ball acceleration while enhancing touch and responsiveness.

PRECISION 7-PLY CARBON BLADE CONSTRUCTION – Five layers of lightweight balsa wood and two integrated carbon fiber layers paired with a 2mm sponge expand the sweet spot for cleaner contact and improved consistency in competitive play.

STIGA – Since 1944, STIGA has been the innovative table tennis brand. Developing industry leading technologies for its table tennis equipment, STIGA combines superior craftsmanship with exceptional performance in every product.

short_description: EXCEPTIONAL SPIN CONTROL: Equipped with ITTF-approved Palio CJ8000 rubbers, known for delivering excellent spin while maintaining top-level control, making it ideal for mastering advanced techniques like topspin, backspin, and sidespin.

ENHANCED BLADE AND GRIP: The upgraded all-wood blade offers unmatched control and feel, while the redesigned flared handle ensures comfortable grip and improved shot accuracy, perfect for beginners and intermediate players.

DURABLE AND PROTECTIVE DESIGN: Features thicker edge tape to protect the rubbers and extend the bat’s lifespan, along with a free Expert Table Tennis case to keep the rubbers clean and in top condition.
GLOBALLY TRUSTED: Part of the globally acclaimed Palio Expert series, the Expert 3.0 continues the tradition of providing high-quality equipment for players serious about improving their game.

product_description: The Palio Expert 3.0 is the latest in the globally acclaimed Palio Expert series, designed for players who are serious about improving their game. Featuring the renowned Palio CJ8000 rubbers, this bat offers exceptional spin potential while maintaining control, making it easier to master topspin, backspin, and sidespin techniques. These rubbers, unchanged from the original Expert bat, are ITTF-approved, ensuring competitive play readiness. The newly upgraded all-wood blade of the Expert 3.0 delivers unmatched control and feeling, perfect for beginners aiming to refine their skills. The flared handle has been redesigned for better comfort and grip, helping you achieve greater accuracy with every shot. To protect your racket, a free Expert Table Tennis case is included to keep the rubbers clean and in top condition. With an ETT rating of Speed = 6/10, Spin = 9/10, and Control = 10/10, the Palio Expert 3.0 is the ideal choice for players looking to advance their table tennis abilities with confidence.

name: Killerspin Jet 600 Spin N2 Ping Pong Racket – Advanced Table Tennis Racket, 5 Layer Wood Blade, Nitrx-4Z Rubbers, Flared Handle
short_description: The Perfect Balance of Speed, Spin, and Control: Looking for the perfect balance of speed, spin, and control? The redesigned Killerspin JET600 SPIN N2 is a tournament-level ping pong paddle engineered for intermediate to advanced players who want to dominate with both power and precision.

SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION: Built with a 5-ply premium wood blade, the JET600 SPIN N2 offers the ideal balance of power and finesse. It’s light enough for rapid reactions and quick transitions, yet solid enough to deliver high-impact shots and consistent ball spin.

Outfitted with Nitrx-4Z high-grip rubbers, this paddle delivers the spin and precision you need to control rallies and outplay your opponent. The ergonomic flared handle ensures a secure, comfortable grip—even during the most intense matches.
IDEAL RATINGS: Features ratings of Control: 7/10, Spin: 8/10, Speed: 7/10, ideal for players who enjoy a well-rounded, dynamic game with powerfull spin while maintaining solid control

Signature Memory Book & Accessories: Each JET 600 Spin N2 paddle is packaged in Killerspin Memory Book case, offering both stylish protection and storage. It also includes two 1-Star training balls—perfect for warm-up or practice. This set makes a thoughtful gift for table tennis enthusiasts or a reliable upgrade for advanced players.
product_description: Product Description The Killerspin Jet600 SPIN N2 Ping Pong Paddle is designed with the competitive player in mind. Perfect for intermediate to advanced players, this table tennis racket combines a soft feel with enough spring for hard-hitters. The blade is constructed of 3 different types of wood for a light and balanced feel. The thicker 2.00 mm sponge is great for ball spin and control. The flared handle features a reinforced grip to add power behind every shot. This paddle comes in a gift-worthy storage box case with space to collect scores, signatures, and personalized messages. The case also provides needed protection for your ping pong paddle. This racket is ITTF-approved for use in competitions to take your gameplay to the next level. Killerspin was built to bring youth and innovation to one of the world's most beautiful sports: table tennis. The Chicago-based company produces premium-quality table tennis equipment, sports apparel and media. Killerspin was created to serve the table tennis player, while providing U.S. homes and offices aesthetically pleasing table tennis gear for head-turning style and competition-level play. The JOOLA Family Table Tennis Set comes in a convenient storage case that can attach to your table and hold all of your table tennis materials! JOOLA is a proud sponsor of the US National Team.
